attributes.action: Legalize cannabis to study further into the medicinal research of  THC and CBD.
attributes.additional_details: People think that legalizing cannabis would bring in huge amounts of tax money to our country...firstly why tax it? Secondly pharmaceutical companies make trillions of pounds/dollars profits from your illnesses and death...why would they legalize a natural medicine? Think people. Don't farmed. Cannabis cannot cure all cancers but can eradicate several forms of it safely without using poison (radio/chemotherapy) Open your eyes people.
attributes.background: To allow you to medicate yourselves freely and safely and to be educated correctly on cannabis and why it's been so suppressed for so long.
